attributes.action: create more waste to energy plants
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Waste to energy is a form of renewable energy which uses household wastes to provide energy by being incinerated.  There are many benefits to using waste to energy, such as financial (less money spent by councils to gather and dispose of waste), as well as environmental (a form of renewable energy that does not damage the environment as much as using fossil fuels, and also results in less need for land fill sites)
